quote_last: , 3:40. Suddenly there was a massive jolt that almost threw him out of his seat. It was followed by a loud screeching of wheels as the train slowed rapidly, and finally came to a halt.
title: Be Careful What You Wish For
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: He could just see the hands of the alarm clock in the darkness:
quote_last: He adjusted his pillow and shut his eyes.
title: The Dogs of Riga
author: Henning Mankell
